activities:
Mitratech is a Software Company that provides it clients services to maintain and automate Legal Matter Management for Corporate Law Departments  Other Components of or software are electronic Service of Process, Litigation Hold, Contact Management and eBilling which is processed through our Collaborati website.  In this capacity, the information we process in not owned or controlled by us and is processed on behalf of our clients; none of this information is property of or controlled by Mitratech. 
Personal information is also collected by Mitratech, from identifiable persons. The purpose for the data collection is for Online and Product marketing, sales (including credit card information), registration and support, billing activities including without limitation invoicing and collection, and customer communications regarding our products and services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Mitratech is registered with the American Arbitration Association (AAA)International Center for Dispute Resolution as our IRM for disputes.
